title: Arrange Unity Catalog Namespace Hierarchy
description: Arrange the Unity Catalog namespace objects in order from top-level to most granular.
hints: Start with the broadest organizational container
Columns are the most granular element
explanation: Unity Catalog uses a three-level namespace: catalog.schema.table. The metastore is the top-level container that holds catalogs. This hierarchy enables fine-grained access control at every level.
